name: Expeditionis Nautilos V0 .1
description:
Version 0.1

Your objective is to collect all the treasures in the sea, Coins, Treasure Chests, Pearls and Mythical Objects. There will be enemies and challenges in future verisons.

Alpha version gives you a 12,000 credit headstart to spend in the shop. Happy exploring!

To exit the first area, go the the low left side of the room to enter the shop, then the door should open.

How to use add-ons: After purchase you can use useful add-ons, which will help you reach new areas.

  • Hydrobrakes - Press 'Spacebar' to activate.
  • Dash - Double tap 'Spacebar' + any arrow key. Gives you a burst of speed, when in full speed it can kill weak enemies too.
  • Oxygen Extender. (Pasive Skill) Oxygen tank depletes at a lower rate.
  • Hook - Left Mouse click. It can reach treasures, hit enemies and attach to walls.

Main Controls:

Move - WASD/ArrowKeys

Go back to headquarters - R (useful when you get stuck, it costs one heart though)
